FOR MISTY, MAY MEANS FISHING!
iBass360 ProStaff Misty Schmidt has taken her fishing to a whole new level this month by fishing some very classic Southern and Northern bass waters with some good friends. Misty hit Toledo Bend with BASS Elite Angler Jamie Hartman Fishing and got into some nice largemouth. Then she took a spring trip to Lake Oneida in NY with NY Northcountry Bassin's Bill Lortz. Not only did she get into some good smallmouth, she managed to add a few new species to her list of fish not usually found in Texas. Well done Misty!#iBass360™ #LiveThePassion #Fishing #Bassfishing #Bassboat #Largemouth #Smallmouth #Stripedbass #Multispecies #jointherevoltion #outdoors #360Nation #resource #community #freshwaterfishing #saltwaterfishing #media #Tips  #NorthAmerica

Being a dad has been one or the coolest experiences of my life thus far. It's taught me a lot of people.

We were all this toddler once upon a time. She's so happy and joyous. She hasn't become scornful of the world. She sees only the good.

How she explores the world around her and is always learn. It think that has to be my favorite part.

Think about it. How often are we genuinely interested in the world around us? How many times are we Intently paying attention to the things not in our direct line of sight?

Be like a child. Happy, carefree and curious!

Simplify: You can also stretch your battery life by simplifying your own activities. Multitasking is nice when you have full power, but running several programs at once puts a greater load on the processor and draws more power. Adjust your computer use by sticking to one application at a time and avoiding resource-intensive programs.

@Regrann from @mmwithnimi -  Today is all about radio! On your way to work this morning please tune in at 8am to @ClassicFM973. 
__
DOCTORS on AIR and @SandraOyewole of the Addo Project, will be discussing #bereavement. We have all  been through bereavement and we all  know someone who is currently bereaved so do get them to tune in.__ 
The @AddoProject launched “THROUGH THE FIRE” last year. It is a step-by-step guide, that deals with a tough and sad fact of life; the loss of a husband. It is an essential survival kit for #widows and a valuable #resource for anyone dealing with the #death of a loved one and those that support them. It’s also a good reference for those that wish to be #enlightened about #bereavement and the plight of #widows in our society. 
___ 
I contributed a chapter, “The Mourning After” to help widows financially through the difficult #transition. It is practical, yet reassures and is tailored to guide a widow as she steps out with confidence into her new life as a widow. __
Contributors to the book include: •"The emotional impact of the death of a spouse” by Akin Ajayi (psychologist) •"The Mourning After” - the financial aspects of widowhood by Nimi Akinkugbe • The legal section by Olajide Oyewole LLP • "Good In laws and Enabling Eve” by Mrs Yejide Osunkeye __
Through the Fire is available in leading bookstores including @patabahbooks, @Laternabooks etc
_____________________
And don't forget to tune at 5.15pm for Personal Finance on @smooth981. We have a special guest Tinashe Muyambo from @Leadwayassurance. He will share thoughts about Life Insurance and Educational Insurance. Protect your families with insurance. 
It's best to be prepared. __
#insurance #widows #orphans #throughthefire #lifeinsurance #mmwn#repost

Son: “Dad?”
.
Father: “Yes?”
.
Son: “Where do babies come from anyhow?”
.
Father: “Why, mothers bring them into the world.”
.
Son: “But why do mothers bring them?”
.
Father: “Johnny, by the grace of heaven, mothers are the only ones who know how to bring babies into the world.”
.
.
Quote from - 'The Miracle - The Story’
.
.

The Addo Project launched “THROUGH THE FIRE” last year. It is a step-by-step guide, that deals with a tough and sad fact of life; the loss of a husband. It is an essential survival kit for #widows and a valuable #resource for anyone dealing with the #death of a loved one and those that support them. It’s also a good reference for those that wish to be #enlightened about #bereavement and the plight of widows in our society. 
___ 
I had the honour of contributing a chapter which I called, “The Mourning After” to help widows financially through the difficult #transition. It is practical, yet reassures and is tailored to guide a widow as she steps out with confidence into her new life in widowhood. 
__
Contributors to the book include: •"The emotional impact of the death of a spouse” by Akin Ajayi (psychologist) •"The Mourning After” - the financial 
aspects of widowhood by Nimi Akinkugbe • The legal section by Olajide Oyewole LLP • "Good In laws and Enabling Eve” by Mrs Yejide Osunkeye 
__
Through the Fire is available in leading bookstores including @patabah, Laterna etc.

#Step_Engineering
👈 سرآغاز هرگونه مطالعه #هیدرولوژي و #منابع_آب که در
آن از سري هاي زمانی داده هاي #هواشناسی و هیدرولوژي استفاده میشود، صحت سنجی داده هاي تاریخی است.
👈 برای این منظور سري زمانی داده ها ابندا باید با استفاده از آزمونهاي آماري مورد ارزیابی قرار گرفته و در صورت نیاز، ناهمگنی ها و نوسانات نامحتمل داده ها اصلاح و یا حذف شوند.
👈 در بین روش هاي مستقل آزمون همگنی شاید بتوان
روش آزمون همگنی نرمال استاندارد ( #SNHT ) را یکی از پرکاربردترین روش ها دانست. که می توان از نرم افزار #SPSS وهمچنین #XLSTAT برای بررسی آن استفاده کرد
.
📝کاری از #گروه_مهندسی_استپ

با ما همراه باشید...
.
.
